an7.22:1.5: ucchecchāmi → ucchejjissāmi (s1-3, pts1) | ucchijjissāmi (mr), anayabyasanaṃ āpādessāmī”ti → āpādessāmi vajjīti (mr)
an7.22:4.1: bījayamāno → vījayamāno (bj) | vijamāno (s1, s2) | vījamāno (s3, pts1)
an7.22:12.1: Ekamekenapi → evaṃ vutte vassakāro brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ekamekenapi (bj) | ekamekenapi tena kho (mr)
